page.title: 20Holiday cottages in Blockley
page.content: Mr Greenstock has lived in Blockley for twelve years. He chose Blockley to buy a hotel and now owns six holiday cottages which he has won awards for.All his cottages are self-catering.He has one cottage that holds two people, two cottages that hold four people,two cottages that hold fivepeople and a large cottage that holds six people. The cottages are open for the whole year but the main season is from Easter to October when they are very busy. During the winter they are still very busy but people come for shorter stays.Four weeks is the most you can rent a cottage for. It is cheaper in the Winter.It is about 50 pounds for a weekend. In the Summer for the same cottage it is about Â£250 pounds for a week.
